programme.title: USA-ITA - Women's Foil Team Gold Medal | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Gold Medal match took place at Grand Palais, Podium Piste, on 01/08/24. Final score The United States of America 45:39 Italy.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 5 | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Semi-Finals for the Men's 200m Backstroke, the Women's 200m Butterfly, and the Women's 200m Breaststroke. It also includes the Finals for the Men's 100m Freestyle, Men's 200m Breastsroke, Women's 1500m Freestyle, Men's 200m Butterfly and the Women's 100m Freestyle. The races took place at Paris La Defense Arena, on 31/07/24.

programme.title: Men's Individual Time Trial | Cycling Road | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Men's Individual Time Trial took place at Pont Alexandre III on the 27/07/24. Remco Evenepoel (BEL) won the Gold Medal, Filippo Ganna (ITA) won the Silver Medal, and Wout Van Aert (BEL) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: The Vault: Julien Alfred, the shoes of Cuba’s wrestling legend, Mexico 1968’s iconic design
programme.desc: Jeannette and Rob discovers Julien Alfred’s kit in The Vault, recently collected at Paris Olympics. The Saint Lucian sprint sensation has overcome many personal challenges to win the first ever gold medal for the Caribbean Island in the 100m final. Rob discovers the magic of a seemingly ordinary dollar bill, in the equestrian community while we learn about the iconic design of Mexico 1968.

programme.title: Women's 50m Rifle 3 Positions Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 50m Rifle 3 Position Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 02/08/24. Chiara Leone (SUI) won Gold with a total of 464.4 points, Sagen Maddalena (USA) won Silver and Qiongyue Zhang (CHN) won Bronze.

programme.title: Double Sculls, Fours, Eights, Single Sculls | Rowing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Nautical St - Flat Water, France, on 01/08/24.
At the Women's Double Sculls Final, Gold was claimed by Team New Zealand, Team Romania won Silver, and the Bronze went to Team Great Britain.
At the Men's Double Sculls Final, Team Romania won Gold, Team Netherlands calimed Silver, and Team Ireland completed the podium, with the Bronze.
At the Women's Four Final, it was Gold for Team Netherlands, Silver for Great Britain, and Bronze for New Zealand.
At the Men's Four Final, Gold was claimed by Team USA, the Silver by Team New Zealand, and the Bronze by Team Great Britain.

programme.title: Men's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Cameron McEvoy (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 21.25 seconds, Benjamin Proud (GBR) took Silver and Florent Manaudou (FRA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Backstroke was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Kaylee McKeown (AUS) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 2:03.73, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Kylie Masse (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Individual Medley - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Individual Medley was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time 1:54.06, Duncan Scott (GBR) took Silver and Wang Shun (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Leon Marchand’s Gold Rush | Wait For It Paris 2024
programme.desc: Leon Marchand made history in Paris. Two golds in one night. Four overall. What happened in the 114 minutes that changed everything?

programme.title: Men's Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Synchronised 3m Springboard competition took place at the Aquatics Centre on 02/08/24.
Gold Medalists Long Daoyi and Wang Zongyuan (CHN), Silver Medalists Juan Manuel Celaya Hernandez and Osmar Olvera Ibarra (MEX) and Bronze Medalists Anthony Harding and Jack Laugher (GBR) stood on the podium during the Diving medal ceremony.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Diver: Is Yona Knight-Wisdom's physique perfectly balanced?
programme.desc: Jamaica's first-ever male Olympic diver is physically analysed in a lab with some remarkable results.

programme.title: Tom Daley at age 14
programme.desc: British diver Tom Daley was causing a media frenzy just before his Olympic debut in 2008, but his late father Rob was keeping him grounded.

programme.title: Women's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Bryony Page (GBR) claimed Gold, Viyaleta Bardzilouskaya (AIN) took Silver and Sophiane Methot (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Ivan Litvinovich (AIN) claimed Gold, Zisai Wang (CHN) took Silver and Langyu Yan (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Bryony Page bounces back from lost move syndrome.
programme.desc: Can you imagine being a world class trampolinist unable to jump? That’s the obstacle Bryony Page had to overcome on her road to Rio 2016…

programme.title: Zheng/Huang (CHN) v Kim/Jeong (KOR) - Mixed Doubles Gold Medal Match | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Doubles Gold Medal Match between Zheng and Huang, from the People's Republic of China, and Kim and Jeong, from the Republic of Korea, took place on 02/08/2024 at La Chapelle Arena. The Chinese pair took the Gold, and the South Korean pair took the Silver. Final Score CHN 2:0 KOR.

programme.title: Jumping Team Final | Equestrian | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Jumping Team Final took place at Chateau de Versailles, Versailles, on 02/08/24. Great Britain won the Gold Medal, Unietd States won the Silver Medal, and France won Bronze.

programme.title: Mat 1: Women +78 kg Elimination Round of 32 | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 78 kg Elimination Round of 32, took place on 02/08/2024 at Champ-de-Mars Arena.

programme.title: Men's 200m Individual Medley - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Individual Medley was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time 1:54.06, Duncan Scott (GBR) took Silver and Wang Shun (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Cameron McEvoy (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 21.25 seconds, Benjamin Proud (GBR) took Silver and Florent Manaudou (FRA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Backstroke was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Kaylee McKeown (AUS) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 2:03.73, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Kylie Masse (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Michael Andrew, Team USA’s Record-Breaking Machine | Splash In
programme.desc: He was a teenager when he started breaking US national age group records. Over the course of his career, he broke more than 100 national records. At Tokyo 2020, he helped team USA break the world record in the 4 x 100 medley relay and won his first Olympic Gold. Soundtrack: Glass Animals, Heat Waves

programme.title: Molly Carlson, Canada’s Brave High Diver | Splash In
programme.desc: She started as a gymnast, then switched to diving, before specializing in high diving (20m) because that is what bravery is to her. Along the journey, she learned how to deal with mental health struggles, an experience that she now shares with her fans as a mental health advocate and founder of the #bravegang. Soundtrack: Bastille, Shut Off The Lights

programme.title: Melissa Wu, the Australian Olympic Diver Who Does Not Give Up | Splash In
programme.desc: At the age of 10 she knew that diving was the sport for her. Throughout her 16 years career, diving helped her overcome depression, anxiety, and lack of self-belief, until she won bronze in Tokyo 2020. Watch her story. Soundtrack: Bree Runway, Pressure.

programme.title: Izzy Thorpe and Kate Shortman, Team GB’s Promising Artistic Swimmers | Splash In
programme.desc: Their mothers competed together years ago, now Izzy and Kate are following in their footsteps. The two best friends are fully in synch in and out of the pool. Tokyo 2020 was their Olympic debut, and they are both looking forward to making a splash at Paris 2024. Soundtrack: Sigrid, Don’t Kill My Vibe

programme.title: Sarah Sjostrom, Sweden’s Swimming Superstar | Splash In
programme.desc: When Sarah slipped and broke her elbow a few months before Tokyo 2020, her fans thought she may not even compete at the Olympics. She fought back, accelerated the recovery, and ended up winning silver in the 50 free. She currently holds 5 World Records and is eyeing Paris 2024 to add new achievements. Soundtrack: Mabel, Let Them Know

programme.title: Michael Bodegas, the Strongman of Italy’s Water Polo Team | Splash In
programme.desc: Olympic Bronze Medallist and World Champion Michael Bodegas says it is the friendship and camaraderie that draw him to water polo. Watch his inspiring story. Soundtrack: ArrDee, Oliver Twist

programme.title: Siniakova/Machac (CZE) v Wang/Zhang (CHN) - Mixed Doubles Gold Medal | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Doubles Gold Medal match between Siniakova/Machac (CZE) v Wang/Zhang (CHN) which took place on Court Philippe Chatrier on 02/08/24. Siniakova/Machac (CZE) won the match with a final score of 6:2, 5:7, 10:8.

programme.title: Rafael Nadal at age 16
programme.desc: Sporting talent runs in Rafael Nadal's family, but by his mid-teenage years the mult-talented Spaniard was on the path to tennis stardom.

programme.title: The Williams Sisters at age 11 and 12
programme.desc: Two of the greatest women players to grace a tennis court, Venus and Serena Williams have never lacked talent, drive, backing or confidence.

programme.title: Roger Federer at age 19
programme.desc: In 2001 tennis legend Roger Federer was yet to reach the world's top ten or win a Grand Slam, but the Swiss star was making a big impact.

programme.title: Women's Final | Cycling BMX Racing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Cycling BMX Racing Women's Finals took place on 02/08/2024 at Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines BMX Stadium.
Saya Sakakibara (AUS) won Gold, Manon Veenstra (NED) won Silver and Zoe Classens (SUI) won Bronze.

programme.title: Men's Final | Cycling BMX Racing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Cycling BMX Racing Men's Finals took place on 02/08/2024 at Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines BMX Stadium.
Joris Daudet (FRA) won Gold, Sylvain Andre (FRA) won Silver and Romain Mahieu (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Men's 10,000m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 10000m Final was help on 02/08/2024 at the Stade de France, Paris. Joshua Cheptegei (UGA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record of 26:43.14mins. Berihu Aregawi (ETH) took Silver and Grant Fisher (USA)completed the podium

programme.title: Mat 1: Men +100 kg Final | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Champ-de-Mars Arena. Teddy Riner (FRA) claimed the Gold medal and Kim Minjong (KOR) took Silver. Final score FRA 10:0 KOR.

programme.title: Mixed Team Gold Medal Match KOR - GER | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Mixed Team Gold Medal Match took place at Invalides, Paris, on 02/08/24. The Republic of Korea won the Gold Medal with a victory over Germany, who won Silver, 6:0

programme.title: The Vault: Julien Alfred, the shoes of Cuba’s wrestling legend, Mexico 1968’s iconic design
programme.desc: Jeannette and Rob discovers Julien Alfred’s kit in The Vault, recently collected at Paris Olympics. The Saint Lucian sprint sensation has overcome many personal challenges to win the first ever gold medal for the Caribbean Island in the 100m final. Rob discovers the magic of a seemingly ordinary dollar bill, in the equestrian community while we learn about the iconic design of Mexico 1968.

programme.title: Yuto Horigome: The Final Trick | Wait For It Paris 2024
programme.desc: Yuto Horigome defended his Olympic title in a legendary street skateboarding final at Paris 2024, sealed with a flawless last trick for the gold.

programme.title: Women's 25m Pistol Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Shooting 25m Pistol Finals were held on 03/08/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre, Paris. Yang Jiin (KOR) claimed Gold, Camille Jedrzejewski (FRA) SIlver and Veronika Major (HUN) completed the podium

programme.title: Single Sculls, Eights Finals | Rowing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men and Women's Rowing Single Sculls and Eights Finals took place on 03/08/2024 Nautical Stadium - Flat Water.
At the Women's Single Sculls Final, Karolien Florijn (NED) claimed the Gold medal, Emma Twigg (NZL) took the Silver, and the Bronze went to Viktorija Senkute (LTU).
At the Men's Single Sculls Final, Oliver Zeidler (GER) won the Gold, Yauheni Zalaty (AIN) took the Silver, while Simon van Dorp (NED) claimed the Bronze medal.
At the Women's Eights Final, it was Gold for Team Romania, Silver for Team Netherlands and Bronze for Team Great Britain.
At the Men's Eights Final, the Gold went to Team Great Britain, the Silver to Team Netherlands and the Bronze to Team USA.

programme.title: Zheng Qinwen (CHN) v Donna Vekic (CRO) - Women's Singles Gold Medal Match | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Women's Singles Gold Medal Match between Zheng Qinwen (CHN) v Donna Vekic (CRO), took place on Court Philippe-Chatrier, Roland-Garros, on 03/08/2024. Zheng Qinwen (CHN), won the Gold, with a final score 6:2, 6:3.

programme.title: Ebden/Peers (AUS) v Krajicek/Ram (USA) - Men's Doubles Gold Medal Match | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Doubles Gold Match between Matther Ebden/John Peers (AUS) v Austin Krajicek/Rajeev Ram (USA), took place on Court Philippe-Chatrier, Roland-Garros, on 03/08/2024. Ebden/Peers won the Gold with a final score 6:7, 7:6, 10:8.

programme.title: Novak Djokovic: The Golden Slam | Wait For It Paris 2024
programme.desc: Novak Djokovic wins his first Olympic gold in Paris, completing the Golden Slam. Relive his emotional victory over Alcaraz after years of near-misses.

programme.title: Zheng Qinwen (CHN) v Donna Vekic (CRO) - Women's Singles Gold Medal Match | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Women's Singles Gold Medal Match between Zheng Qinwen (CHN) v Donna Vekic (CRO), took place on Court Philippe-Chatrier, Roland-Garros, on 03/08/2024. Zheng Qinwen (CHN), won the Gold, with a final score 6:2, 6:3.

programme.title: Chen/Jia (CHN) v Liu/Tan (CHN) - Women's Doubles Gold Medal Match | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Doubles Gold Medal Match between Chen/Jia (CHN) and Liu/Tan (CHN) took place on 03/08/2024 at La Chapelle Arena. Chen and Jia took the Gold, while Liu and Tan took the Silver. Final Score 2:0.

programme.title: Men's Floor | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Artistic Gymnastics session took place at the Bercy Arena, France, on 03/08/2024. At the Men's Floor Exercise Final Carlos Edriel Yulo (PHI) won the Gold medal, Artem Dolgopyat (ISR) claimed the Silver, and Jake Jarman (GBR) took the Bronze.

programme.title: Men's Skeet Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Shooting Skeet Final was held on 03/08/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre, Paris. Vincent Hancock (USA) claimed the Gold, Conner Lynn Prince (USA) took Silver and Lee Meng Yuan (TPE) completed the podium

programme.title: Women's Vault | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Artistic Gymnastics session took place at the Bercy Arena, France, on 03/08/2024. At the Women's Vault Final, Simone Biles (USA) won the Gold medal, Rebeca Andrade (BRA) took the Silver, and Jade Carey (USA) claimed the Bronze.

programme.title: Men's Pommel Horse | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Artistic Gymnastics session took place at the Bercy Arena, France, on 03/08/2024. At the Men's Pommel Horse Final, Rhys Mc Clenaghan (IRL) claimed the Gold medal, while Nariman Kurbanov (KAZ) won the Silver and Stephen Nedoroscik (USA) took the Bronze.

programme.title: Ebden/Peers (AUS) v Krajicek/Ram (USA) - Men's Doubles Gold Medal Match | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Doubles Gold Match between Matther Ebden/John Peers (AUS) v Austin Krajicek/Rajeev Ram (USA), took place on Court Philippe-Chatrier, Roland-Garros, on 03/08/2024. Ebden/Peers won the Gold with a final score 6:7, 7:6, 10:8.

programme.title: Zheng Qinwen (CHN) v Donna Vekic (CRO) - Women's Singles Gold Medal Match | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Women's Singles Gold Medal Match between Zheng Qinwen (CHN) v Donna Vekic (CRO), took place on Court Philippe-Chatrier, Roland-Garros, on 03/08/2024. Zheng Qinwen (CHN), won the Gold, with a final score 6:2, 6:3.

programme.title: KOR-UKR - Women's Sabre Team Gold Medal Match | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Gold Medal match took place at Grand Palais, Podium Piste, on 03/08/24. Team Ukraine claimed the Gold against Republic of Korea, with a final score of KOR 42:45 UKR.
